FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our plans

Unlike major carriers who inflate single-line prices to push family plans, we offer the same fair rate to everyone. Our efficient MVNO model means we can offer premium service at reasonable prices for all customers.

Absolutely! Our single line plans include all the same features - 5G access, mobile hotspot, unlimited data - that family plan users get. You don't sacrifice anything by being an individual user.

No problem! You can add additional lines to your account at any time. Each line gets its own great rate, and you can manage everything from one account if you'd like.

Major carriers like Verizon and AT&T charge $75-80/month for a single unlimited line. Vouch Mobile offers comparable service for just $25/month - that's over $600 in annual savings.

Nope! One line is all you need. There's no minimum line requirement and no pressure to add more. We welcome single-line customers.

Yes! You have your own individual account with your own login, bill, and settings. You're not grouped with anyone or dependent on another account holder.
